author: Phil Vickery
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6.  Place two layers of tin foil in a frying pan over a high heat. Add the wine, garlic, shallots and tomato and heat until simmering.  Add the basil, lemon juice and mussels and scrunch the foil closed over the top to form a parcel. Cook the parcel in the oven for 8-10 minutes. Open up the parcel and discard any mussels that haven't opened. Serve the foil parcel on a plate.
ingredients: 2 tbsp white wine,  2 garlic cloves, peeled, chopped,  2 shallots, peeled, chopped,  1 tomato, chopped,  a few fresh basil leaves, torn,  1 tbsp lemon juice,  6-8 mussels, cleaned, debearded (discard any that do not close tightly when tapped)
